Creations

The Tech Academy

 https://www.learncodinganywhere.com

I'm the co-founder of The Tech Academy, a technology training company headquartered in Portland, Oregon. We deliver coding bootcamps - immersive, intensive training that turns you into a well-rounded entry-level technology professional. A pioneer in the coding bootcamp space, we are recognized around the world as one of the best providers of both on-campus and on-line developer education. Our innovative training philosophy and methods make it possible for any bright person to break into the technology industry. We also deliver advanced training to clients such as the U.S. Air Force, CarMax and many others.

You Are Not Stupid: Computers and Technology Simplified

 http://mybook.to/youarenotstupid

My co-founder, Jack Stanley, and I wrote this book because we have the purpose to bridge the gap between people and technology. In today's world, we all use technology on a daily basis. Yet all too often, we do so with little understanding of how it works. The barriers to understanding the world of computers and tech are very real: how do these tiny devices work? What is a computer, actually? How can I learn the subject when it's riddled with complex technical jargon that no one seems to explain in a clear, simple way? We wanted to break down the subject so that anyone could understand it. Since we couldn't find any resource out there that did this well, we made it. If you have a friend or loved one who "just doesn't get computers," give them this book. It will change their life.

The Project Management Handbook: Simplified Agile, Scrum and DevOps for Beginners

 mybook.to/projectmgmthandbook

No matter your role in a technology company, an understanding of the basics of project management is vital to success. But a newcomer to the area can rapidly get lost in specialized terminology and conflicting data. This book simplifies the subject so you can understand and operate with it, no matter how it is implemented in your company. It covers: Agile, Scrum, DevOps and how software is made.
